name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】最初で最後の #かなけん3DLIVE !!【天音かなた、沙花叉クロヱ、AZKi  ⧸ ホロライブ】 [IhJW-YPJ-z0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Habit' by Amane Kanata, Sakamata Chloe, and AZKi.
Performance of the song 'Haruru' (Sunny) by Amane Kanata, Sakamata Chloe, and AZKi.

subtitles.original: 俺たちだって動物
subtitles.english: We're animals, too

subtitles.original: こういうのって好物
subtitles.english: We love this kind of thing

subtitles.original: ここまで言われたらドM
subtitles.english: If you say all that, I must be a masochist

subtitles.original: 腹の底からコブシ
subtitles.english: A guttural shout from the bottom of my stomach

subtitles.original: そう、俺たちだって動物
subtitles.english: That's right, we're animals, too

subtitles.original: 故に持論自論に縛られな、習性
subtitles.english: So don't be bound by your own theories—it's just a habit

subtitles.original: 自分で自分を分類するなよ
subtitles.english: Don't go classifying yourself

subtitles.original: 壊して見せるよ、そのBad Habit
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can break that bad habit

subtitles.original: 壊して見せるよ、そのBad Habit
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can break that bad habit

subtitles.original:
晴る
天音かなた、沙花叉クロヱ、AZKi
作詞・作曲：n-buna
subtitles.english:
Sunny
Vocals: Amane Kanata, Sakamata Chloe, AZKi
Lyrics/Composition: n-buna

subtitles.original: あなたは風のように 目を閉じては夕暮れ
subtitles.english: You're like the wind, closing your eyes at dusk

subtitles.original: 何を思っているんだろうか
subtitles.english: I wonder what you're thinking about

subtitles.original: 瞼を開いていた あなたの目にビイドロ
subtitles.english: Your eyelids were open, like glass in your eyes

subtitles.original: 今少しだけ晴れの匂いがした
subtitles.english: Just now, it smelled a bit like clear weather

subtitles.original: 晴れに晴れ、花よ咲け さあ、出で晴るの背
subtitles.english: Shine and shine, bloom, oh flowers! Come now, the back of the clear sky

subtitles.original: 降りやめば雨でさえ あなたを飾る晴る
subtitles.english: If it stops raining, even the rain is a clearing sky that decorates you

subtitles.original: 胸を打つ音よ鳴れ 暴力的な春風
subtitles.english: Let the sound that strikes the heart ring out, oh violent spring breeze

subtitles.original: あの雲も越えて行け 遠くまで 遠くまで
subtitles.english: Go even beyond those clouds, far away, far away

subtitles.original: あなたは晴れ模様に 目を閉じては青色
subtitles.english: You're in a clear sky, closing your eyes to the blue

subtitles.original: 何が悲しいんだろうか
subtitles.english: I wonder what's so sad

subtitles.original: 瞼を開いていた あなたの目にビイドロ
subtitles.english: Your eyelids were open, like glass in your eyes

subtitles.original: 今少し雨の匂いがした
subtitles.english: Just now, it smelled a bit like rain

subtitles.original: 泣きに泣け、空よ鳴け さあ、出で晴るの背
subtitles.english: Cry and cry, oh sky, cry out! Come now, the back of the clear sky

subtitles.original: 降りしきる雨でさえ 雲の上では晴る
subtitles.english: Even the pouring rain is a clearing sky above the clouds

subtitles.original: 土を打つ音よ鳴れ 暴力的な晴れに
subtitles.english: Let the sound hitting the earth ring out in the violent clear sky

subtitles.original: あの海も越えて行く 遠くまで 遠くまで
subtitles.english: Going even beyond that sea, far away, far away

subtitles.original: 通り雨、草も靡かせて 羊雲、あれも晴るの背
subtitles.english: A passing shower, making the grass sway; altocumulus clouds, they too are the back of the clear sky

subtitles.original: 風のよう、胸に晴るの背
subtitles.english: Like the wind, the back of the clear sky in my heart

subtitles.original: 晴るを待つ
subtitles.english: Waiting for the sky to clear

subtitles.original: 晴れに晴れ、花よ咲け さあ、出で晴るの背
subtitles.english: Shine and shine, bloom, oh flowers! Come now, the back of the clear sky

subtitles.original: 降りやめば雨でさえ あなたを飾る晴る
subtitles.english: If it stops raining, even the rain is a clearing sky that decorates you

subtitles.original: 胸を打つ音よ奏で 暴力的な春風
subtitles.english: Let the sound that strikes the heart play out, oh violent spring breeze

subtitles.original: 音に聞く晴るの風 さあ、この歌よ鳴れ
subtitles.english: The clearing wind heard in sound; now, let this song ring out

subtitles.original: 晴れに晴れ、花よ咲け さあ、出で晴るの背
subtitles.english: Shine and shine, bloom, oh flowers! Come now, the back of the clear sky
